commit message: Added preference to choose how often to sync.
Added api level check for periodic sync code, so the native addPeriodicSync will be called for api-8+.
Fixed reference to deliciousdroid in readme.
Browse and view bookmark screens now reload their content on resume, so editing or adding a bookmark will be immediately reflected, without having to back out and reopen the activity.
Editing a bookmark and removing a tag now correctly decrements its count/deletes it in the tag table.
Tag lists now refresh on resume.
Browse bookmark and tag views now maintain their scroll position when they are refreshed.
